reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening a multisectoral and integrated response to HIV and TB centered on patients, communities, and human rights to end both diseases in Chad by 2030

description.narrative: Chad - TB/HIV - Ministry of Public Health and National Solidarity - MOH. This program has the following goals: 95% des PVV connaissent leur statut serologique/ 95% of PLHIV who know their HIV status. 95% des PVV connaissant leur statut serologique sont sous TARV/95% of PLHIV who know their status are on ART. 95% des PVV sous TARV ont une charge virale indetectable/95% of PLHIV on ART have reached viral load suppression. Contribuer à la réduction de la mortalité et de la morbidité dues à la tuberculose d’ici 2025 de 75% de décès par rapport à 2015 et de 50% de l'incidence par rapport à 2015 ainsi que la réduction des coûts catastrophiques auprès des patients souffrant de la tuberculose et familles affectées au Tchad/ Contribute to the reduction of TB mortality and morbidity by 75% of deaths in 2025 compared to 2015 and 50% of incidence compared to 2015, as well as the reduction of catastrophic costs for TB patients and affected families in Chad.. The objectives of this program are: Réduire les nouvelles infections à VIH de 36% d’ici à fin 2025/ Reduce new HIV infections by 36% by the end of 2025. Réduire le taux de transmission de la mere à l'enfant à moins de 10% d'ici 2025/ Reduce the rate of mother-to-child transmission to less than 10% by 2025. Réduire les décés liées au VIH à moins de 9/100000 habitants d'ici a fin 2025/ Reduce HIV-related deaths to less than 9/100,000 by the end of 2025. Réduire la proportion des PVV ayant vecu une experience de stigmatisation et de discrimination a moins de 10% d'ici a fin 2025/ Reduce the proportion of PLHIV who have experienced stigma and discrimination to less than 10% by the end of 2025. Augmenter le nombre de cas de tuberculose (toutes formes confondues) notifiés pour atteindre 21447 en 2025 / Increase the number of TB cases (all forms combined) reported to 21447 by 2025. Traiter avec succès au moins 90% des patients tuberculeux pharmaco sensible d'ici 2025/ Treat successfully at least 90% of drug-sensitive TB patients by 2025. Accroitre la détection de nombre de cas de TBMDR notifiés de 12% (en 2020) pour atteindre 50% des cas attendus d’ici fin 2025/ Increase detection of reported MDR-TB cases by 12% (in 2020) to reach 50% of expected cases by the end of 2025. Traiter avec succès au moins 85 % des cas de tuberculose MR détectés d’ici 2025/ Successfully treat at least 85% of notified MDR-TB cases by 2025. Tester au VIH au moins 90% des malades tuberculeux dépistés (toutes formes confondus) d’ici 2025/ Provide HIV testing to at least 90% of notified TB patients (all forms) by 2025. Mettre sous ARV au moins 95% des patients tuberculeux coinfectés d’ici fin 2025/ Initiate ART to at least 95% of co-infected HIV+TB patients by the end of 2025

receiver-org.narrative: Ministry of Public Health and National Solidarity
Ministry of Public Health and National Solidarity

title.narrative: Outcome indicator for TCD-C-MOH

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of men who have sex with men who avoid health care because of stigma and discrimination
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Coverage / Output indicator for TCD-C-MOH
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of health facilities with tracer medicines for the three diseases available on the day of the visit or day of reporting
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of new and relapse TB patients tested using WHO recommended rapid tests at the time of diagnosis
Percentage of PLHIV on ART who initiated TB preventive therapy among those eligible during the reporting period
Number of people in contact with TB patients who began preventive therapy
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Number of TB cases (all forms) notified among prisoners
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Percentage of registered new and relapse TB patients with documented HIV status
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Impact indicator for TCD-C-MOH
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
